p: To investigate whether Monarda essential oils activated members of the vanilloid group of TRP channels (V1 and V4), we performed real-time calcium imaging in HEK 293 cells stably overexpressing either hTRPV1 or hTRPV4 channels. Representative traces show that 20 Âµg/mL of MEO Fl and MEO Lv failed to induce any increase in [Ca 2+] i in HEK hTRPV1 and HEK hTRPV4 cells ( Figure 3).
